cave.description: A dimly lit and cool cave with large stalactites and stalagmites.

forest.description: A densely forested area with a mixture of hard and soft wood, and evergreen trees.

lake.description: Pebble beaches and cattails dot the shores of a clear and cold lake.

mountain.description: A jagged mountain pass with large cracks, sharp corners, and steep ledges.

plain.description: Rolling hills of calf-length grass extend as far as the eye can see.
